message.content:
Sure, here is a sample meal plan for the week:

**Monday:**
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed berries and chia seeds
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli

**Tuesday:**
- Breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, mixed berries, banana, and coconut milk
- Lunch: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette
- Dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with mixed vegetables, tofu, and brown rice

**Wednesday:**
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with mixed vegetables and whole wheat toast
- Lunch: Grilled chicken wrap with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and hummus
- Dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted carrots and quinoa

**Thursday:**
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and honey (substitute honey for maple syrup)
- Lunch: Grilled fish tacos with mixed greens, avocado, and salsa verde
- Dinner: Vegetable soup with mixed vegetables, beans, and quinoa

**Friday:**
- Breakfast: Avocado toast with mixed greens and poached eggs
- Lunch: Grilled steak salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette
- Dinner: Baked tofu with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli

**Saturday:**
- Breakfast: Overnight oats with mixed berries and chia seeds
- Lunch: Grilled chicken sandwich with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado mayo
- Dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with mixed vegetables, tofu, and brown rice

**Sunday:**
- Breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, mixed berries, banana, and coconut milk
- Lunch: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette
- Dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted carrots and quinoa

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and try to incorporate some form of exercise into your routine. Enjoy your healthy meals!
